thread.title: BRIEF-Sohu.Com Says On April 11, Co Entered Into A Credit Facility Agreement With China Merchants Bank

title: BRIEF-Sohu.Com Says On April 11, Co Entered Into A Credit Facility Agreement With China Merchants Bank

organizations.name: credit facility agreement with china merchants bank reuters staff

text:
April 16, 2018 / 1:28 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Sohu.Com Says On April 11, Co Entered Into A Credit Facility Agreement With China Merchants Bank Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Sohu.Com Inc: 
* SOHU.COM INC - ON APRIL 11, CO ENTERED INTO A CREDIT FACILITY AGREEMENT WITH CHINA MERCHANTS BANK CO., LTD - SEC FILING 
* SOHU.COM INC - PURSUANT TO CREDIT FACILITY AGREEMENT CO IS ENTITLED TO BORROW UP TO AN AGGREGATE OF RMB700 MILLION (OR ABOUT US$111.27 MILLION) 
* SOHU.COM INC - ALSO ON APRIL 11, 2018, CO MADE AN INITIAL DRAWDOWN OF RMB400 MILLION (OR ABOUT US$63.58 MILLION) UNDER CMB LOAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
